levels.description:
Active Effect: When HP is lower than <@ba.vup>{max_hp_ratio:0%}</>, stops attacking and blocking enemies; Becomes less likely to be targeted by enemies and restores <@ba.vup>{hp_recovery_per_sec_by_max_hp_ratio:0%}</> Max HP every second
Passive Effect: <@ba.rem>Block +1</>;
